text: Hey everyone, I'm Fabian and I work in Cologne as Content Marketing Manager. text: Hi everyone - I’m Ruben, the founder of <https://quiltt.io|Quiltt>, a low-code consumer fintech infrastructure platform.  We just raised our seed round and are gearing up to come out of closed beta in the coming months. I’m excited to learn more about different approaches to content marketing and meet great folks working in this space.

text:
Hello Everyone, I am Kishan and I am one the founding team members and leading business for <http://www.peppercontent.io|Pepper> - the largest content marketplace globally. We are a Series-B company with over 100,000+ creators creating content for over 2500+ creators across text, design, language and video.

We have another product called <http://Peppertype.ai|Peppertype.ai> which is currently the best GPT3 tool for AI-Driven content tool across the globe in terms of quality. We are here to create the next revolution using technology in the content space and I am here to learn from you all in the community and see how we can add mutual value to each other. Feel free to reach out in case I can be of any help!

Upwards and Onwards :)

attachments.fallback: Pepper Content - World's Largest Content Marketplace for Businesses and Creators
attachments.text: What makes Pepper Content the go-to content platform for 1,000+ businesses and 50,000 content creators? Learn more about how we help brands create impactful content through our robust freelance network.

text: Hi everyone!  I’m Kellie - Senior Director of Content at Treasure Data. I’m transitioning to an in-house role after a long run in agencies.  Looking forward to conversations about content marketing for tech.  Also, I’m hiring a few content marketing managers and a PR role if you’re looking!

text: Hi everyone! I'm Joel, a B2B tech copywriter (plus some content mixed in, naturally!) with a recent focus on developer/ITOps/DevOps products. Got here via a wholehearted recommendation from a fellow copywriter, and since I'm working on that tricky, vague transition from full-time freelancer to business owner, I'm excited to learn more from everyone here! Would love to make some new connections on <https://www.linkedin.com/in/joel-hans/|LinkedIn>, too.

text: Hey everyone, I lead a team of writers for an edtech company — we create courses within healthcare, corporate, and higher ed. space. From time to time I'll be looking for freelancers to help out with our projects. But, I also freelance with clients in the outdoor space and looking to expand that this year.

text:
Hello everyone! 

I'm Sharan, from Mumbai (India) and I'm a freelance content writer with over 5 years of experience across various niches like SaaS, cryptocurrency & NFTs, digital marketing, E-commerce, etc.

I aim at creating SEO focused long-form articles that help drive engagement, and sales. 

It's a pleasure to connect with all of you from varied niches and explore Synergies if possible. 

You can find me here - 

Website: <http://www.sharanphillora.com|www.sharanphillora.com>
LinkedIn: <https://www.linkedin.com/in/sharan-kaur-phillora|https://www.linkedin.com/in/sharan-kaur-phillora>
